amendment.description: To reauthorize the Runaway and Homeless Youth Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 290, under the order of 4/21/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 159.

action.text: Amendment SA 290 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S2329-2330, S2330-2331) To reauthorize the Runaway and Homeless Youth Act.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 290, under the order of 4/21/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 159.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 290, under the order of 4/21/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 159.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 290 proposed by Senator Leahy.
